attributes.description:
Controls how wide scrollbars appear (the vertical scrollbar on the right side of content areas). This determines the thickness of the scrollbar track and thumb.
CSS variable: --wm-scroll-bar-width

Controls how tall scrollbars appear (the horizontal scrollbar at the bottom of content areas). This determines the thickness of the scrollbar track and thumb.
CSS variable: --wm-scroll-bar-height

Sets the background color of scrollbar tracks (the channel that the scrollbar thumb moves along). This is the background area of the scrollbar.
CSS variable: --wm-scroll-bar-track-bg

Controls the corner rounding of scrollbar tracks (the channel that the scrollbar thumb moves along). This makes the scrollbar track appear with rounded corners.
CSS variable: --wm-scroll-bar-track-radius

Sets the background color of scrollbar thumbs (the draggable part of the scrollbar that users click and drag to scroll). This is the interactive element of the scrollbar.
CSS variable: --wm-scroll-bar-thumb-bg

Controls the corner rounding of scrollbar thumbs (the draggable part of the scrollbar). This makes the scrollbar thumb appear with rounded corners.
CSS variable: --wm-scroll-bar-thumb-radius

Sets the background color of scrollbar thumbs when users hover over them (the draggable part of the scrollbar). This provides visual feedback when users interact with the scrollbar.
CSS variable: --wm-scroll-bar-thumb-hover
